# Wave Shield (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Water Spells|water]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bloodrager Spells|Bloodrager 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Magus Spells|Magus 1]], [[1st Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 199

You create a rushing torrent of water in the rough outline of a shield. The water protects you from one physical or fire attack, granting you DR/â€” and fire resistance equal to half your caster level (minimum 1) on that attack. Once the spell has reduced the damage of one attack against you, it is discharged.
